message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $180 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I could meet you halfway at $155.  It's a steal for that price!
Alice, $155 is still a little too high for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $140. It's a fair price considering the value I see in this product.
